responses.question_1: The person produces high quality product

responses.question_2: The person aims to improve the quality of the end result beyond expressed requirements

responses.question_3: The person is living by the company values (passion, expertise, openness and care)

responses.question_4: The person is aligned with company best practices

responses.question_5: The person delivers quality even with limited resources (time, resources, information, guidance)

responses.question_6: Feedback about the person's quality focus

responses.question_1: The person is willingly helping others

responses.question_2: The person takes other people's views into consideration

responses.question_3: The person isn't afraid to ask for help from others

responses.question_4: The person has a good attitude towards all the aspects of their work

responses.question_5: The person shares knowledge openly to others

responses.question_6: Other feedback about the persons people skills

responses.question_1: The person has good prioritisation skills

responses.question_2: The person can see our work from the client's perspective (note: the client can be internal)

responses.question_3: The person has a positive attitude

responses.question_4: The person has a proactive way to take things forward

responses.question_5: The person is productive working independently

responses.question_6: The person can take good care of personal workload by prioritizing and delegating

responses.question_2: The person can inspire others to perform better

responses.question_3: The person improves the team they are a part of

responses.question_4: You can always rely on the person to deliver

responses.question_1: The person is capable to learn new things fast

responses.question_2: The person is interested in developing themselves and their skills

responses.question_3: The person sees change as an opportunity instead of a threat

responses.question_4: The person is ready to adopt new different working methods

responses.question_5: The person is able to handle change and uncertainty

responses.question_6: Other feedback about readiness for change

responses.question_1: The person has good problem-solving skills

responses.question_2: The person can provide multiple options with pros and cons on how to solve a problem

responses.question_3: The person can foresee and prevent negative outcomes of solutions and decisions
